title: Did the Instagram newspaper fall from Rihanna to the value of the stock market?
subtitle: The star urged 61 million of its followers to "stretch away" the app most likely made a significant contribution to the loss of $750 million in one day.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: "Rihanna Instagram's letter to the followers of Snapchat's application caused the company's shares to fall by hundreds of millions of dollars in one day."
